name: Tanks n Legs
description:
It's the year 2XXX and the great king Tankulon lies dead. Now his sons are locked in an eternal struggle for power of the great kingdom of Sked. Blind with rage they rampage through the castle, running and shooting until their bloodlust is sated and the other bends the knee. Take control of one of the brothers and show your superiority over the other through your unmatched uncontrollable speed and your deadly bullets of unholy intervals in this new and exciting game jam game: Tanks ‘n Legs. 

A twin stick shooter, local muti-player for 2 players.

Controls:
Player 1
Movement:  WASD
Aiming: Arrow keys

Player 2 (Controller required)
Movement: Left joystick
Aiming: Right joystick

Shoot your way to victory while pacing through the castle!
